Illegal To Link

13 Aug 1999

Universal Pictures has asked an Ottawa resident not to link to their copyrighted movie trailers from his web site. Worse news: he complied. Universal's lawyers sent letters. Might makes right? There'd not be much of a web if we're prohibited from posting links like this one to the article at the Globe and Mail.
